titleStmt.title: The Christians cabala, or, Sure tradition necessary to be known and believed by all that will be saved : a doctrine holding forth good tidings of great joy, to the greatest of penitent sinners : with a character of one that is by John Brinsley ...
titleStmt.author: Brinsley, John, fl. 1581-1624.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
